titleStmt.title: Bee thankfull London and her sisters; or, A sermon of thankfulnesse setting downe the kindnesse of God to vs ... by Robert Abbott ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,
